an7.63:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an7.63:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesane manussā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā honti.
an7.63:4.4: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.63:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an7.63:5.1: “Kiṃ nu te, gahapati, nivesane manussā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
an7.63:5.3: Sā neva sassuṃ ādiyati, na sasuraṃ ādiyati, na sāmikaṃ ādiyati, bhagavantampi na sakkaroti na garuṃ karoti na māneti na pūjetī”ti.
an7.63:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā sujātaṃ gharasuṇhaṃ āmantesi:
an7.63:6.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho sujātā gharasuṇhā bhagavato paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.63:6.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho sujātaṃ gharasuṇhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an7.63:7.3: Vadhakasamā, corīsamā, ayyasamā, mātāsamā, bhaginīsamā, sakhīsamā, dāsīsamā.
an7.63:7.4: Imā kho, sujāte, satta purisassa bhariyāyo.
an7.63:7.6: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
an7.63:7.7: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathāhaṃ imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ jāneyyan”ti.
an7.63:7.8: “Tena hi, sujāte, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
an7.63:7.10: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho sujātā gharasuṇhā bhagavato paccassosi.
an7.63:8.5: ‘ Vadhā ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (1)
an7.63:9.5: ‘ Corī ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (2)
an7.63:10.5: ‘ Ayyā ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (3)
an7.63:11.5: ‘ Mātā ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (4)
an7.63:12.1: Yathāpi jeṭṭhā bhaginī kaniṭṭhakā,
an7.63:12.5: ‘ Bhaginī ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (5)
an7.63:13.5: ‘ Sakhī ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (6)
an7.63:14.5: ‘ Dāsī ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati. (7)
an7.63:15.2: ‘ Corī ca ayyā’ti ca yā pavuccati;
an7.63:16.2: ‘ Dāsī ca bhariyā’ti ca sā pavuccati;
an7.63:17.1: Imā kho, sujāte, satta purisassa bhariyāyo.
an7.63:17.3: “Ajjatagge maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dāsīsamaṃ sāmikassa bhariyaṃ dhāretū”ti.
